name: Light Bug
description:
This is our submission to the Wowie Jam 4.0.

The theme was "Collaborate with AI". In this game, you have to help a moth find their beloved firefly by showing them the way in the darkness of the night. The moth's movements are controlled by a pathfinding script, and the player can only place lights to guide them.

But beware : the night can be scary and dangerous for a little bug...
